title: Dance in Public Space
description:
www.danceinpublicspace.com

Dance in public space, Artmovie 8 minutes.

Spontanious dance in public space, about breaking patterns , to make it possible to express ourselfs , not necessarily in an institution. Not getting outlet for your emotions may leed to frustration and in worst case agression. -- Freedom of expression!

Dans i det offentliga rummet, Konstfilm 8 min.
